Chinese (Simplified): 大自然的有嚼劲、无调味的橡皮糖...
Chinese (Traditional): 大自然的耐嚼、未經調味的小熊軟糖...
Ukrainian: Жорсткі, неприправлені мармеладні ведмедики від природи...

English: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.
Chinese (Simplified): 一开始看起来像个松垮的科学实验，但经过一些加热后，它变成了多汁、滋滋作响的零食明星。
Chinese (Traditional): 它一開始看起來像一個鬆軟的科學實驗，但經過一番加熱後，它就變成了一個多汁、鐵板的零食超級明星。
Dutch: Het begint met eruit te zien als een slap wetenschappelijk experiment, maar na wat hitte komt het tevoorschijn als een sappige, sissende snacksuperster.
French: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.
Italian: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.
German: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.
Spanish: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.
Brazilian Portuguese: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.
Polish: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.
Japanese: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.
Korean: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.
Ukrainian: Спочатку це виглядає як млявий науковий експеримент, але після нагрівання воно перетворюється на соковиту, шиплячу суперзірку серед закусок.
Russian: It starts out looking like a floppy science experiment, but after some heat, it emerges as a juicy, sizzling snack superstar.

English: The goth cousin of regular sausage—dark, mysterious, and a little intense.
Chinese (Simplified): 普通香肠的哥特表亲——黑暗、神秘，还有点强烈。
Chinese (Traditional): 普通香腸的哥德表親——深色、神秘，還有點強烈。
Dutch: De gothneef van de gewone worst – donker, mysterieus en een beetje intens.
French: The goth cousin of regular sausage—dark, mysterious, and a little intense.
Italian: The goth cousin of regular sausage—dark, mysterious, and a little intense.
German: The goth cousin of regular sausage—dark, mysterious, and a little intense.

Polish: The goth cousin of regular sausage—dark, mysterious, and a little intense.
Japanese: The goth cousin of regular sausage—dark, mysterious, and a little intense.
Korean: The goth cousin of regular sausage—dark, mysterious, and a little intense.
Ukrainian: Готична кузина звичайної ковбаси — темна, загадкова і трохи інтенсивна.
Russian: The goth cousin of regular sausage—dark, mysterious, and a little intense.

English: Just feed it chunks of meat, crank the handle, and out comes a pile of delicious potential
Chinese (Simplified): 只需喂进去一块块的肉，转动手柄，就会出来一堆美味的潜力。
Chinese (Traditional): 只要餵它大塊肉，轉動手柄，就會產生一堆美味的潛力
Dutch: Geef het gewoon stukken vlees, draai aan de hendel, en daar komt een berg heerlijke potentie uit.
French: Just feed it chunks of meat, crank the handle, and out comes a pile of delicious potential
Italian: Just feed it chunks of meat, crank the handle, and out comes a pile of delicious potential

Spanish: Just feed it chunks of meat, crank the handle, and out comes a pile of delicious potential

Polish: Just feed it chunks of meat, crank the handle, and out comes a pile of delicious potential
Japanese: Just feed it chunks of meat, crank the handle, and out comes a pile of delicious potential
Korean: Just feed it chunks of meat, crank the handle, and out comes a pile of delicious potential
Ukrainian: Просто кладіть шматки м'яса, поверніть ручку, і з'являється купа смачних можливостей.
Russian: Just feed it chunks of meat, crank the handle, and out comes a pile of delicious potential

English: If you don't Rock and Stone, you ain't comin' home!
Chinese (Simplified): 如果你不摇滚与石头，你就别想回家！
Chinese (Traditional): 如果你不搖滾，你就回不了家！

English: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?
Chinese (Simplified): 为什么只要发抖？你还可以享受一个五彩缤纷的想象马戏团！
Chinese (Traditional): 當您還可以享受豐富多彩的想像馬戲團表演時，為什麼只喝奶昔呢？
Dutch: Waarom alleen de rillingen hebben als je ook een kleurrijk denkbeeldig circus kan hebben?
French: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?
Italian: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?
German: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?
Spanish: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?
Brazilian Portuguese: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?
Polish: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?
Japanese: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?
Korean: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?
Ukrainian: Навіщо просто мати тремтіння, коли можна мати ще й кольоровий уявний цирк?
Russian: Why just have the shakes when you can also have a colorful imaginary circus?

English: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
Chinese (Simplified): 因为你的鲁莽决定不会自己修复！现在有了方便的瓶装——只需一口，治愈，并假装你差点没死。
Chinese (Traditional): 因為你魯莽的決定不會自行解決！現在裝在一個方便的瓶子裡——只需喝下，治愈，然後假裝你沒有差點死掉。
Dutch: Want je roekeloze beslissingen gaan zichzelf niet oplossen! Nu in een handige fles—gewoon opdrinken, genezen en doen alsof je niet bijna dood was.
French: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
Italian: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
German: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
Spanish: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
Brazilian Portuguese: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
Polish: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
Japanese: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
Korean: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
Ukrainian: Твої безрозсудні рішення самі себе не виправлять! Тепер у зручній пляшечці — просто випий, зцілися і зроби вигляд, що майже не помер.
Russian: Because your reckless decisions aren't going to fix themselves! Now in a convenient bottle—just chug, heal, and pretend you didn’t almost die.
